code: import*as actions from'../actions/actionTypes';var intState={status:false,imgSrc:''};var changePhotoReducer=function changePhotoReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:intState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actions.HANDLE_CHANGE_PHOTO:return{status:action.payload.status,imgSrc:action.payload.imgSrc};default:return state;}};export default changePhotoReducer;
